name: Shrek's Basement
description:
• This game is a sequel to my first game "Escape The Shrek". However, "Shrek's Basement" is much more refined and features better gameplay and quality.
  • The game builds atmosphere using a VHS film aesthetic and uses said effect to intensify the horror.
SUPPORT Developing consumes a lot of time and requires expenses. So, any amount of donation (through itch.io or my Patreon) helps me tremendously! Thanks!
